subject: Tennis
United States Open (Tennis)
lead_paragraph: Top-ranked Novak Djokovic wasted a chance to serve out the match and was beaten by sixth-seeded Tomas Berdych in the Italian Open quarterfinals in Rome.
snippet: Top-ranked Novak Djokovic wasted a chance to serve out the match and was beaten by sixth-seeded Tomas Berdych in the Italian Open quarterfinals in Rome.
